targets.query:
from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "daswetter.0.NextDays.Location_1.Day_1.Wetterbedingungen_value" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Wetter heute")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Zeitstempel" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Zeitstempel")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Wetter morgen")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Gefuehlte_Temperatur" and r._field == "value")

  |> yield(name: "gefï¿½hlte Temperatur")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_Tag" and r._field == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Solar Heute")

from(bucket: "Wetterdaten")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "javascript.0.Statistik.Temperatur.Auï¿½en.Max_24h" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Hï¿½chstwert 24h")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_VorTag" and r._field == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "? Gestern")
  |> yield(name: "Gestern")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_Tag" and r._field == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "? Heute")
  |> yield(name: "Heute")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_Woche" and r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "? aktuelle Woche")
  |> yield(name: "aktuelle Woche")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_Monat" and r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "? aktueller Monat")
  |> yield(name: "aktueller Monat")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_Jahr" and r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "? aktuelles Jahr")
  |> yield(name: "aktuelles Jahr")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Info.Solarenergie_VorJahr" and r._field == "value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000.0}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "? Vorjahr")
  |> yield(name: "Vorjahr")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Regenrate" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Regenrate")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Regen_Tag" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "tï¿½gliche Regenmenge")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Wind_max" or r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Windrichtung")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Windrichtung"] and exists r["${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Wind_max"])
  |> rename(columns: {"${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Windrichtung": "directionRad", "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Wind_max": "speedMps"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  direction: r.directionRad / 3.14 * 180.0 }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  speed: r.speedMps / 0.514 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first, column: "direction", createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.Wetter.Ozon.Ozonwert" and r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Ozon")
  |> yield(name: "Ozon")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Wind" and r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Windgeschwindigkeit")
  |> yield(name: "Windgeschwindigkeit")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Druck_Tendenz" and r._field == "value")
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Drucktendenz")
  |> yield(name: "Drucktendenz")

from(bucket: "${shorttermBucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${Data_Prefix}.${Data_Instanz}.${Data_Ordnername}.Sonnenstrahlung" and r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Sonnenstrahlung")
